name: HIS notebook
tagline: Open notebook for my work at University of Skövde
body:
### Welcome to my notebook
In here I will try my best to record my research at the University of Skövde, where I am an adjunct professor in molecular biology, focusing on the signaling pathways of reactive oxygen species (ROS) in autoimmunity.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
